translation.en: ♪ In the depths of the sea ♪
I've dreamed of being a volunteer at the Oceanic Center
ever since I was little.
Relax, Cleo. You'll ace the interview.
translation.ko: 긴장하지 마, 클리오 인터뷰 잘할 거야

translation.en: You know more about fish than all the employees put together.
translation.ko: 인터뷰 잘할 거야 물고기에 대해서라면 네가 센터 직원보다 잘 알걸

translation.en: But when I'm nervous I get really flustered.
translation.ko: 그래, 그런데 긴장하면 얼굴이 빨개지고 횡설수설한다고

translation.en: - I blush, I blabber... - [seagulls squawk]
What is that racket all about?
[Emma] What are those seagulls up to?
- Oh! - Hmm?
What on earth is that?
Looks like a cross between a lobster and an earthworm.
It isn't a lobster. It's a little hermit crab.
And he's lost his shell.
We've got to find him another one,
otherwise he'll wind up as lunch for some bird.
Hey. What about this little car?
Perfect, Emma.
[Cleo] Another happy ending.
- [boy] Hi, girls. - Ah, it's Lewis.
So, ready for your big interview, Cleo?
Sorry we can't go with you. It's just that we...
translation.ko: 같이 못 가서 미안해, 클리오 정말이야, 그게...

translation.en: Yeah, I know. You promised to go with Emma
translation.ko: 그래, 알아 에마 수영 연습하는 데 같이 가기로 했잖아

translation.en: to her swimming training. It's fine. Don't worry about it.
translation.ko: 에마 수영 연습하는 데 같이 가기로 했잖아 괜찮아, 걱정 마

translation.en: Yeah. Don't worry about it, girls. I'll be with her.
translation.ko: 그래, 걱정 마, 얘들아 내가 같이 가잖아

translation.en: [Cleo] This is horrible. My hands are clammy from stress.
Listen, just be yourself. Believe in yourself.
translation.ko: 긴장하니까 손에서 땀이 나 클리오 자신감 있게, 평소대로 해

translation.en: Thanks for coming with me, Lewis.
You're a real friend.
And when I'm older, I'd like to work in environmental protection
translation.ko: 나중에 커서 환경보호 일을 하고 싶어요

translation.en: and volunteering here would be excellent experience for me.
translation.ko: 여기서 자원봉사를 하면 좋은 경험이 될 거예요

translation.en: Good. Your interests seem like a pretty good match.
translation.ko: 좋아, 이 일에 관심이 많은 것 같구나

translation.en: Now, Jeff's going to ask you a few questions
translation.ko: 네가 얼마나 알고 있는지 지금부터 제프가 몇 가지 물어볼 거다

translation.en: to assess your knowledge.
translation.ko: 지금부터 제프가 몇 가지 물어볼 거다

translation.en: So, Cleo, you know that
the Dolphin City bay is a natural reserve.
translation.ko: 돌핀 시티 만이 자연보호 구역인 거 알죠?

translation.en: Can you name six species of fish that live in the bay?
translation.ko: 그 만에 사는 물고기 종류 여섯 가지만 말해볼래요?

translation.en: Sure, there are sardines and halibut, mackerel and herring.
translation.ko: 네, 그럼요, 정어리하고 넙치, 고등어, 그리고 청어

translation.en: That's good, but can you name some of the species
translation.ko: 네, 그럼요, 정어리하고 넙치, 고등어, 그리고 청어 좋아요, 그런데 수산 시장에 있는 거 말고

translation.en: - that are slightly more exotic? - Exotic species.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 그런데 수산 시장에 있는 거 말고 희귀종들을 말해봐요 희귀종요?

translation.en: Right. Fish. Well, I'm not really... I don't...
- So? - Disaster.
I knew the answers, but I panicked.
I felt like I had a black hole instead of a brain.
translation.ko: 머릿속에 큰 구멍이 뚫린 거 같았다니까

translation.en: I blew it. They'll never take me now.
Don't lose faith, Cleo. We all know you're the best.
translation.ko: 낙담하지는 마 누가 뭐래도 네가 최고니까

translation.en: Please, Mr. Lambert. Give her another chance.
translation.ko: 제발요 기회를 한 번만 더 주세요

translation.en: She panicked because it was so important to her.
translation.ko: 제발요 기회를 한 번만 더 주세요 이 일이 자기한테 중요하니까 긴장해서 그런 거라고요

translation.en: It was just a few simple questions.
translation.ko: 이 일이 자기한테 중요하니까 긴장해서 그런 거라고요 아주 쉬운 질문이었다

translation.en: If she panics that easily, how will she react
to a bunch of tourists bombarding her with questions?
translation.ko: 나중에 관광객이 질문 퍼부을 땐 어쩌려고?

translation.en: Actually, she was sick that day. She should have canceled
translation.ko: 네, 그런데... 사실 그날 좀 아팠대요 취소했어야 했지만

translation.en: but decided to go to the interview without mentioning it.
translation.ko: 그냥 내색도 안 하고 면접을 본 거라고요

translation.en: You're not going to penalize her for that, are you?
Hello? Yes.
Uh-huh. I see. Yes, of course. Thanks. [shrieks]
That was Mr. Lambert.
He offered me another interview in three days.
translation.ko: 3일 후에 다시 면접 보러 오라고 하셔

translation.en: - Fantastic! - That's great.
You see? I told you, Cleo.
You just have to go in there
translation.ko: 거봐, 그럴 줄 알았어 이번에는 꼭 잘해서 네 실력을 다 보여줘

translation.en: and show them how brilliant you really are.
translation.ko: 이번에는 꼭 잘해서 네 실력을 다 보여줘

translation.en: What if I blow it again? I've got to study.
[Lewis] You already know all that stuff.
You just need to believe in yourself
and you need to stop worrying and relax.
translation.ko: 그럼 당황하지 않고 잘할 수 있을 거야

translation.en: You're right. So what do you suggest?
Well, uh...
Skin diving! And out at Mako Island as well!
If you weren't coming with me, there's no way I'd do something like this.
translation.ko: 너희가 없었으면 혼자는 엄두도 못 냈을 거야

translation.en: Mako Island has an incredible number
translation.ko: 마코 섬 주변 바닷속에는 특이한 해양 생물이 엄청 많이 돌아다녀

translation.en: of exotic underwater species.
translation.ko: 특이한 해양 생물이 엄청 많이 돌아다녀

translation.en: You'll learn more here than from a stack of books.
- [Rikki] And here we are. - [girls laugh]
So, ready for an adventure?
So, are you having a good time?
You bet!
Wow, that was great. You were right.
After a tour like that, I'll never have a mental blank again.
translation.ko: 이렇게 보고 나니 이제는 안 잊어버릴 거 같아

translation.en: I'll never forget anything I saw.
translation.ko: 이렇게 보고 나니 이제는 안 잊어버릴 거 같아 직접 봤으니 절대 안 잊어버려!

translation.en: We should probably think about heading back to port
if we're gonna make it before sunset.
It's no use. The motor's flooded.
I'll call my father. He can get us in the Coast Guard boat.
translation.ko: 아빠한테 전화할게 그럼 해안 경비대랑 같이 오실 거야

translation.en: [Lewis] Good idea. We're not going anywhere in this thing.
Snap! I can't get a signal.
Me neither. This island is too far from anywhere.
translation.ko: 내 것도 그래, 섬이 너무 멀어서 신호가 안 잡히나 봐

translation.en: It looks like we're gonna have to spend the night here.
translation.ko: 내 것도 그래, 섬이 너무 멀어서 신호가 안 잡히나 봐 할 수 없지, 그럼 오늘 밤은 여기서 자야겠다

translation.en: What? Sleeping outside? Are there any wild animals?
translation.ko: 뭐? 여기서 자자고? 혹시 위험한 동물은 없을까?

translation.en: And our parents will be worried sick.
translation.ko: 뭐? 여기서 자자고? 혹시 위험한 동물은 없을까? 부모님은 어쩌고? 걱정하실 텐데

translation.en: I'm not saying we won't get in trouble for it tomorrow,
but unless you have a better suggestion...
I don't believe this.
It sounds like he swallowed an airplane motor.
[Rikki] Look over there, that light.
Do you think there could be somebody there?
Shouldn't we tell Lewis where we're going?
translation.ko: 루이스한테 말 안 하고 가도 될까?

translation.en: No, we may as well let him sleep.
Besides, we don't need boys to help. We can take care of ourselves.
translation.ko: 그리고 늘 남자한테 의지할 수는 없잖아

translation.en: [Cleo] Here we are, girls.
Whoa! It's amazing.
Let's check it out.
[Emma] Careful, Rikki!
Rikki!
Emma! Rikki! Where are you?
Everybody alright?
Yeah, we're good.
Strange. Why is it so bright down here?
translation.ko: 이상해 동굴 안이 왜 이렇게 환하지?

translation.en: The grotto is covered in some sort of phosphorescent moss
translation.ko: 인광성 이끼야 이게 빛을 내서 안이 환한 거지

translation.en: that glows in the dark.
translation.ko: 이게 빛을 내서 안이 환한 거지

translation.en: I don't know about you guys,
but I've seen enough for one night. Let's get out of here.
translation.ko: 난 여기서 밤새우기는 싫어 어서 나가자

translation.en: I don't believe it.
We have to find another way out.
The pool must be linked to the sea.
We could get out by swimming underwater.
Sorry, girls, but I don't think I can make it.
We've got no choice. Nobody knows where we are.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 사람들은 우리가 어디 있는지 모르잖아

translation.en: If we stay here, they'll never find us.
translation.ko: 여기 있으면 우리를 절대 못 찾을 거야

translation.en: I'll go first and have a look, then I'll come back and get you.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 내가 먼저 가서 보고 너희를 데리러 올게

translation.en: I can do 30m underwater. Piece of cake.
translation.ko: 잠수로 30m는 갈 수 있어 별거 아니야

translation.en: But where... Where are my legs? What's going on? This is crazy.
translation.ko: 뭐야 다리가 어떻게 된 거지? 무슨 일이야?

translation.en: - We're... - [all] Mermaids!
What's happening to us? I don't want to turn into a fish.
translation.ko: 대체 어떻게 된 거지? 물고기 되기 싫단 말이야!

translation.en: Calm down, Cleo. Everything will be fine.
I don't know how, but it's got to be fine.
Emma? Emma!
We can get out this way.
Come on, don't be scared. We'll all go together.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 클리오 다 같이 가면 돼

translation.en: Cleo, you don't need to hold your breath. Just breathe normally.
translation.ko: 클리오, 숨 참을 필요 없어 그냥 편하게 숨 쉬어

translation.en: This is crazy. We're breathing and talking underwater.
translation.ko: 세상에, 물속에서 숨도 쉬고 말도 할 수 있잖아?

translation.en: Let's hope Lewis is still sleeping.
We can't let him see us like this.
Shh. Listen.
- What? I can't hear anything. - Exactly. When we left Lewis,
he was snoring loud enough to wake the dead.
translation.ko: 루이스 코 고는 소리가 들려야 하잖아

translation.en: Girls, I was super worried...
Don't just stand there with your mouth hanging open.
translation.ko: 그렇게 입 벌리고 서 있지만 말고

translation.en: Get over here and give us a hand.
translation.ko: 그렇게 입 벌리고 서 있지만 말고 어서 와서 좀 도와줘!

translation.en: OK, you saw a light and fell down a hole.
- Then what happened? - We don't know.
All three of us were in this grotto...
- [boat horn] - Oh, no, the Coast Guard!
It's my father. He must have sent out the alert
translation.ko: 아빠야 어제 우리가 안 와서 신고하셨나 봐

translation.en: - when we didn't come back. - If he sees us, it's game over.
translation.ko: 어제 우리가 안 와서 신고하셨나 봐 이 모습을 들키면 우리는 끝이야

translation.en: [Emma] And with tails we can't run into the bushes and hide.
translation.ko: 그런데 다리 대신 꼬리밖에 없으니 숲으로 도망갈 수도 없잖아 이게 어떻게 된 거지?

translation.en: [Cleo] What's going on?
Oh, gosh. I can feel my legs, they're back!
Unbelievable. Mine, too.
- Same here. - That's certainly a relief.
translation.ko: 믿어지질 않아 내 다리도! 나도 그래 아무튼 다행이다

translation.en: Listen up. We can't talk about this to anyone,
translation.ko: 잘 들어 아무한테도 말하면 안 돼

translation.en: and especially not our parents. Got it?
[Lewis] On the bright side, someone's come to rescue us.
translation.ko: 뭐 어쨌든 간에 우리는 이제 살았네

translation.en: I don't think I'll be around long to enjoy it.
translation.ko: 그건 그런데... 또 오고 싶지는 않을 거 같아

translation.en: [man] Can you imagine if Lewis's mother
translation.ko: 루이스네 엄마가 너희 간 데를 몰랐으면 어쩔 뻔했어?

translation.en: hadn't known where you were? How would we have found you?
translation.ko: 루이스네 엄마가 너희 간 데를 몰랐으면 어쩔 뻔했어? 그랬으면 어떻게 찾았겠니

translation.en: We couldn't have known that Lewis's boat would breakdown.
translation.ko: 그랬으면 어떻게 찾았겠니 루이스의 보트가 그렇게 고장 날 줄 몰랐어요

translation.en: That isn't the issue. You should have told us beforehand.
translation.ko: 그게 중요한 게 아니잖아 가기 전에 미리 말했어야지

translation.en: It's hardly acting responsibly. Right, Mom?
translation.ko: 정말 무책임한 행동이죠 안 그래요, 엄마?

translation.en: Kim, do you mind? No one asked for your opinion.
translation.ko: 정말 무책임한 행동이죠 안 그래요, 엄마? 킴, 조용히 해 누가 너보고 끼어들래?

translation.en: I promise, Mom, it's the last time
translation.ko: 약속할게요 이제 바다에 가기 전에 꼭 엄마한테 말씀드릴게요

translation.en: I go out to sea without warning you.
translation.ko: 이제 바다에 가기 전에 꼭 엄마한테 말씀드릴게요

translation.en: Hey, can you take me with you next time?
translation.ko: 누나, 다음에는 나도 데려가면 안 돼?

translation.en: Elliot! Absolutely not, young man.
Dinner will be ready in five minutes.
Elliot, can you close the door, please?
translation.ko: 엘리엇, 가기 전에 방문 좀 닫아줄래?

translation.en: Elliot!
I've got to head off to work, but I haven't finished with you.
translation.ko: 지금은 일하러 가야 하니까 이따 다시 얘기하자

translation.en: We'll discuss your punishment tonight.
translation.ko: 널 어떻게 혼내야 할지는 돌아와서 생각해야겠다

translation.en: Hey, Rikki, what's new?
I hope your clothes were dry.
You're gonna pay for that!
Oh, no, it can't be. It's happening again!
What's gotten into her?
So, every time we touch water we transform into a mermaid?
translation.ko: 그러니까 물에 닿을 때마다 인어로 변한단 말이야?

translation.en: Water is everywhere. What are we gonna do?
translation.ko: 사방이 물이잖아 그걸 어떻게 다 피해

translation.en: What about my dream of being a championship swimmer? It's over.
You always say science has an answer for everything.
translation.ko: 이제 다 끝났어 넌 늘 과학에 답이 있다고 했잖아

translation.en: Now is a good time to prove it. Find us a solution, Mr. Genius.
translation.ko: 넌 늘 과학에 답이 있다고 했잖아 지금 증명해봐 해결책을 찾아보라고, 천재 씨

translation.en: What do I know about mermaids?
Up until today I didn't believe in them.
It might be that you're all fine and I'm hallucinating.
translation.ko: 사실은 이 모든 게 꿈일지 어떻게 알아

translation.en: Lewis, you're the only one who can help us.
translation.ko: 루이스, 우리를 도와줄 사람은 너밖에 없어

translation.en: Not only are you a genius, but you're the only one who knows our secret.
translation.ko: 넌 천재고, 게다가 우리 비밀을 알고 있잖아

translation.en: OK, Cleo, I'll get to work on it.
Alright, listen up. Nobody can ever know.
translation.ko: 좋아, 잘 들어 우선 아무한테도 들키면 안 돼, 절대로

translation.en: Nobody, or they'd stick you in a laboratory
translation.ko: 우선 아무한테도 들키면 안 돼, 절대로 그럼 너희 모두를 실험실에 데려가서 연구하려 들 거라고

translation.en: and do all kinds of experiments on you.
translation.ko: 그럼 너희 모두를 실험실에 데려가서 연구하려 들 거라고

translation.en: But if we transform every time we touch water,
translation.ko: 하지만 몸에 물이 닿을 때마다 변한다면

translation.en: everybody will know about us in two days.
Hold on, first off we're not certain you transform every time.
translation.ko: 잠깐! 매번 인어로 변하는 건 분명히 아닐 거야

translation.en: We have to assess it scientifically, do some tests.
Tests? What do you mean, tests? What kind of tests?
We have to reproduce your transformation
translation.ko: 실험? 무슨 실험을 하자는 거야? 아까 집에서 인어로 변했던 상황을

translation.en: under the same conditions as earlier, at home.
- How are we gonna do that? - Like this!
- [both] Wow. - Did you see that?
It's like she's got some kind of magic power.
translation.ko: 꼭 무슨 마법을 부리는 거 같았어

translation.en: So, to sum up then,
apparently Cleo can control water to give it whatever form she wants.
translation.ko: 클리오는 물을 원하는 형태로 다양하게 바꿀 수 있고

translation.en: Rikki, you can make it boil and you, Emma, can freeze it.
translation.ko: 리키는 물을 끓이고 에마는 얼릴 수 있다는 거지?

translation.en: It's all very well having superpowers,
translation.ko: 리키는 물을 끓이고 에마는 얼릴 수 있다는 거지? 특별한 능력이 생겨서 좋기는 하지만

translation.en: but so what if I can turn a pool into a skating rink?
translation.ko: 올림픽에 나가서는 어쩌라고? 수영장을 스케이트장으로 만들면 어떡해

translation.en: How is that supposed to help me?
Not to mention that
we still haven't a clue what's happened to us.
There's only one solution.
We've got to return to Mako Island. That's where it all started.
translation.ko: 이 일이 시작된 곳인 마코 섬으로 돌아가 보는 거지

translation.en: Of course. Why didn't I think of that?
translation.ko: 그래, 맞아 왜 그 생각을 못 했지?

translation.en: The grotto where you first transformed.
There has to be something special in the water.
translation.ko: 그 물에 뭔가 특별한 게 있을 거야

translation.en: Bring me back a sample and I can analyze it.
translation.ko: 이걸 가지고 가서 물을 떠다 주면 분석해볼게

translation.en: OK, but I'm not so sure magic will show up under a microscope.
translation.ko: 이걸 가지고 가서 물을 떠다 주면 분석해볼게 그래, 그런데 과연 마법이 현미경으로 보일까?

translation.en: It's so strange to be breathing underwater.
It feels like the oxygen is liquid.
translation.ko: 산소가 액체로 돼 있는 거 같아

translation.en: I love it. It's the coolest thing I've ever done.
translation.ko: 정말 굉장해 이렇게 멋진 경험은 난생처음이야

translation.en: And look how fast I can swim.
translation.ko: 게다가 진짜 빨리 헤엄칠 수 있어

translation.en: It's crazy. Can you imagine if I could do this in a pool?
I could break every record.
Hi there. Who are you?
- [all gasp] - Yoo-hoo! I'm over here.
- Yoo-hoo! - You can talk.
translation.ko: 유후, 나 여기 있어! 유후! 말을 하잖아? 물고기가 말을 하다니!

translation.en: You're a fish and you can talk.
You're funny. My name is Ziggy.
You're new around here, aren't you?
If you'd like, I can give you a guided tour.
[Ziggy] So, let me introduce the school of sardines,
translation.ko: 자, 소개해줄게 저쪽은 정어리 떼, 해마들

translation.en: the seahorses, Marcel the grouper, the jellyfish is Carlotta
and the twin dolphins are Robby and Bobby.
I'm sure you've already heard of us.
We're the biggest stars in the bay.
But don't be too awestruck. We may be stars, but we're not stuck up.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 너무 쫄지는 마 그냥 편하게 얘기해도 괜찮아

translation.en: What species are you?
Let me guess. Common dolphins.
Are you kidding? Come on! We're spinner dolphins.
translation.ko: 뭐라고? 말도 안 돼 우리는 스피너돌고래야

translation.en: And we're way leaner and more muscular
translation.ko: 우리는 참돌고래보다 훨씬 더 근육질에 날렵하다고

translation.en: than those pathetic little common dolphins.
translation.ko: 우리는 참돌고래보다 훨씬 더 근육질에 날렵하다고 감히 누구랑 비교를 해

translation.en: Say, girls, didn't we have something urgent to do?
translation.ko: 얘들아 우리 할 일 있었지, 아마?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, right, sorry. We have to get going.
translation.ko: 맞다, 미안 나중에 가는 길에 꼭 다시 들를게, 약속해!

translation.en: But we'll come back and see you soon. Promise!
translation.ko: 나중에 가는 길에 꼭 다시 들를게, 약속해!

translation.en: Bye-bye!
I was sure it was this way.
But, Emma, we've already passed this coral before.
translation.ko: 이쪽인 줄 알았는데 그런데 에마 이 산호는 아까도 지나갔잖아

translation.en: Hey, look over there. It's that little hermit crab we saved.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 저기 봐 우리가 살려줬던 소라게야

translation.en: Come on, faster, Zita, let's go faster!
translation.ko: 빨리빨리! 어서 가자 지타, 더 빨리 가야 해!

translation.en: It looks like he's in trouble.
Oh! I recognize them. They were at Mako Island.
translation.ko: 쟤네 알아 마코 섬 근처에서 봤어

translation.en: Someone ought to stop those bullies.
Come on, girls, let's go!
Hang on. That's a hammerhead shark, Rikki!
Where'd they go?
- There! - [taunting]
Stop. Leave them alone!
- Who are you? - And what are you?
We're mermaids. And don't even think about hurting those two.
translation.ko: 정체가 뭐냐? 우리는 인어야 앞으로 쟤네 괴롭히지 마

translation.en: Go pick on somebody your own size.
Hey, boss, Burke think them mermaids
translation.ko: 너희한테 맞는 상대랑 놀라고 보스 저 인어들한테 예의가 뭔지 가르쳐주는 게 어때요?

translation.en: need to learn some manners.
translation.ko: 저 인어들한테 예의가 뭔지 가르쳐주는 게 어때요?

translation.en: You can't talk to us like that.
Our powers! Quick!
Nice try.
Oops. You missed.
[laughs] Why don't you learn to aim?
- [all splutter] - Burke no can see.
translation.ko: 뭐야, 왜 이래? 앞이 안 보여

translation.en: OK, now!
- Quick, let's go. - [crab] Right you are!
Aw, thanks. Lucky you were there.
They get their kicks picking on us.
By the way, I'm Bernie and she's Zita.
We already met. Don't you remember? On the beach.
translation.ko: 우리 저번에 만났었잖아 해변에서 껍데기 잃어버렸을 때

translation.en: - You'd lost your shell. - Oh, yes, of course.
You saved my life. So that makes it twice now.
translation.ko: 그때도 날 구해줬으니 벌써 두 번째네

translation.en: But... But you were different.
Yes, we've changed a bit. We've been this way since we went to Mako Island.
translation.ko: 그래, 좀 변했지 마코 섬에 갔다가 이렇게 됐어

translation.en: We're trying to get back there, but we got lost.
translation.ko: 거기 다시 가려는데 길을 잃었지 뭐야

translation.en: [Bernie] I'll take you there. Come on, Zita, let's go.
translation.ko: 이런, 내가 데려다줄게 지타, 어서 가자 마코 섬으로 출발

translation.en: We're off to Mako Island.
translation.ko: 지타, 어서 가자 마코 섬으로 출발

translation.en: The vandals. They found us again.
- That way. I recognize it. - [Bernie] Quick!
translation.ko: 놈들이야, 또 따라왔어 저쪽이야, 이제 알겠어 빨리 가자

translation.en: Phew. OK, I don't think they saw which way we went.
translation.ko: 여기 들어오는 건 못 본 거 같아

translation.en: Bernie, Zita, we need you to watch the entrance to the cave.
translation.ko: 버니? 지타? 너희가 동굴 입구 좀 지켜줘

translation.en: [Bernie] OK, will do.
I don't see anything special. It's just a plain old cave.
translation.ko: 뭐 특별한 건 없어 보여 그냥 흔한 동굴이야! 별거 없네

translation.en: - A dime a dozen. - Remember what Lewis said,
translation.ko: 그냥 흔한 동굴이야! 별거 없네 루이스 말이 맞을지 몰라 물 때문일 수도 있어

translation.en: it might be something in the water.
translation.ko: 루이스 말이 맞을지 몰라 물 때문일 수도 있어

translation.en: You think he'll find mermaid molecules in it?
translation.ko: 설마 그 안에 인어 분자라도 있을까 봐?

translation.en: Can't we head back? The place gives me the creeps.
translation.ko: 돌아가면 안 될까? 여기는 너무 음산한 것 같아

translation.en: The last time, the full moon, it had a magical feel to it.
translation.ko: 지난번에는 보름달이 떠서 신비한 기운이 느껴졌는데

translation.en: But right now it's just really gloomy.
translation.ko: 지난번에는 보름달이 떠서 신비한 기운이 느껴졌는데 지금은 그냥 음산하기만 해

translation.en: - Maybe it was the full moon. - What?
You think it might be because of the full moon?
translation.ko: 뭐? 이 모든 일이 보름달 때문이었다는 거야?

translation.en: So, did you find anything?
- No, nothing at all. - Then follow me.
translation.ko: 아니, 아무것도 없어 그럼 날 따라와

translation.en: I know someone who might be able to help you.
translation.ko: 내가 너희를 도와줄 수 있는 친구를 알거든

translation.en: Here we are. Hey, Sue, are you home?
Yes.
Sue, I've brought you...
Three mermaids. Yes, I know.
- Hello. We're... - Looking for answers.
translation.ko: 안녕? 우리는... 해답을 찾고 있지 그것도 알아

translation.en: I know that, too.
She has an answer for everything.
Did this happen to us because of Mako Island?
translation.ko: 거봐 뭐든지 다 안다고 했지? 그럼 이건 다 마코 섬 때문이야?

translation.en: Mako is a mystery. It's said the island is magic
translation.ko: 그럼 이건 다 마코 섬 때문이야? 마코는 신비로워 마법의 섬이라고 불리지

translation.en: and that when the moon is full,
creatures are born from its depths.
translation.ko: 그 심연 속에서 새로운 생명이 태어나

translation.en: Magic?
So, how can we go back to how we were before?
translation.ko: 그럼, 어떻게 하면 옛날로 돌아갈 수 있어?

translation.en: There must be a way to break the spell.
translation.ko: 마법을 되돌릴 방법이 있을 거 아니야

translation.en: It isn't a spell. This is the will of the universe.
translation.ko: 그건 마법이 아니야 우주의 뜻이며 섭리지

translation.en: No one can alter the laws of nature.
translation.ko: 그건 마법이 아니야 우주의 뜻이며 섭리지 그 누구도 자연의 법칙을 거스를 수는 없어

translation.en: I must leave you now.
But I shall see you again.
The laws of nature? What the heck is she on about?
There's nothing natural about turning into a mermaid.
translation.ko: 인어로 변하는 게 무슨 자연의 법칙이냐고

translation.en: You've got to trust her. Sue knows the answers to all mysteries.
translation.ko: 수 말을 믿으래도? 정말 모르는 게 없다니까

translation.en: Oh, no! They found us again.
- What do we do? - They're passing us.
translation.ko: 이런 놈들이 또 나타났어! 어쩌지? 그냥 가네?

translation.en: - [vandals laugh] - [eel] OK, this way.
You're going to regret running into the vandal gang.
translation.ko: 우리 갱단을 만난 걸 후회하게 해주마

translation.en: We've got no choice. We've got to confront them.
translation.ko: - 맞아 - 어쩔 수 없어 맞서 싸우자

translation.en: We've got to show them we're just as tough as they are.
translation.ko: 계속 남을 괴롭히게 놔둘 수는 없지 좋아, 그럼 지금부터 내 말을 잘 들어

translation.en: In that case, listen carefully. The trickiest one is Dany.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그럼 지금부터 내 말을 잘 들어 - 가장 교활한 게 '대니'야 - 나다!

translation.en: Watch out for his tentacles.
Burke, with his eyes on the side,
can see everywhere. And he can make very sharp turns.
translation.ko: 사방을 다 볼 수 있어 그리고 방향 전환이 아주 빨라

translation.en: But the worst is Murray because he's as sneaky as he is mean.
Thanks for the advice.
We've got a few tricks of our own up our sleeve.
translation.ko: 하지만 우리에게 방법이 있으니까 걱정 마

translation.en: We haven't got all day here.
That's one down.
- You're up. - I'll g-get 'em, boss!
translation.ko: 네 차례야, 대니 좋아요, 내가 해치울게요

translation.en: You and me, marshmallow.
Talk about clingy. Let go of me.
translation.ko: 왜 이렇게 끈끈해? 이거 놔, 어서!

translation.en: Imbecile.
This could be a problem.
Rikki, use your power. Make the water boil.
translation.ko: 리키, 네 능력을 써 물을 끓여버려

translation.en: Emma, behind you!
Take that!
B-B-Boss, w-w-what do we d-d-do now?
Alright, we'll finish our little chat another time.
translation.ko: 좋아, 못다 한 얘기는 나중에 하기로 하자고

translation.en: Yeah! A-A-Another time!
Oh! I've never been so scared in my whole life.
I think it was fantastic.
It was the most amazing adventure I've ever had.
With our powers, we can do anything.
translation.ko: 마법만 있으면 우리는 못할 게 없어

translation.en: You got that right. Between us,
we put a whooping on those bullies.
One thing's for sure. Cleo won't have any trouble
translation.ko: 우리 셋이 그 녀석들을 일망타진했잖아 하나 확실한 건 클리오가 면접 전에 실전 경험을 했다는 거야

translation.en: acing her big interview now!
translation.ko: 클리오가 면접 전에 실전 경험을 했다는 거야

translation.en: My interview! I'd forgotten all about it.
[Cleo] We can find a very rich ecosystem in the bay.
Probably because of all the coral reefs,
which attracts many different species.
- For example? - There are spinner dolphins,
manta rays and there are even hammerhead sharks.
translation.ko: 스피너돌고래도 있고 쥐가오리 그리고 귀상어도 있어요

translation.en: Hammerhead sharks? I forgot, we did have one of those
translation.ko: 귀상어라고? 그래, 맞아 실제로 몇 년 전에

translation.en: - a few years ago. - They might not be too bright,
but with their eyes on each side of their head, they can see all around them.
translation.ko: 눈이 양쪽 옆에 달려있어 사방을 다 볼 수 있어요

translation.en: And you wouldn't believe the sharp turns they can make.
translation.ko: 방향 전환도 아주 빠르게 할 수 있죠

translation.en: You're right, but how do you know all that?
translation.ko: 그래, 맞아 어떻게 그렇게 잘 알지?

translation.en: I analyzed the water from the grotto
and it's just perfectly normal seawater.
Maybe the manta ray was right, it's something magical.
translation.ko: 가오리 말이 맞을지도 몰라 마법인가 봐

translation.en: What the heck am I saying? I must be going crazy.
translation.ko: 내가 뭐라는 거야? 미쳤나 봐, 연구를 계속해볼게

translation.en: I'll continue my research. The process may be reversible.
translation.ko: 미쳤나 봐, 연구를 계속해볼게 너희를 되돌릴 수 있을 거야 치료법을 알아낼게

translation.en: - I'll find a cure. - Find a cure? To cure what?
translation.ko: 너희를 되돌릴 수 있을 거야 치료법을 알아낼게 치료법? 뭘 치료하는데?

translation.en: - Our amazing mermaid powers? - We're mermaids now.
translation.ko: 설마 우리 인어 능력을? 어찌 됐든 이제 우리는 인어야

translation.en: Whatever happens, no one can alter the laws of nature.
translation.ko: 어찌 됐든 이제 우리는 인어야 누구도 자연의 법칙을 거스를 수는 없지, 안 그래?

translation.en: - Right, Cleo? - Huh? Yeah.
translation.ko: 누구도 자연의 법칙을 거스를 수는 없지, 안 그래? 응? 어, 그래

translation.en: Hello? Hello, Mr. Lambert.
Oh, you mean it? Absolutely. Thanks! Goodbye.
I've been hired at the Oceanic Center!
- And all because of... - The mermaids of Mako.
translation.ko: 다 누구 덕분이지? 마코 섬의 인어들이지!
